name: Voodoo Restoration
desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

name: Searing Arrows
desc: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

name: Psionic Trap
desc: Templar Assassin places mystical traps that invisibly monitor enemy movement. When sprung at her command, they exert a slowing influence of 30% in the area. Traps charge up to slow 60% after 4 seconds. Deals bonus damage when fully charged.

name: Unstable Current
desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every 5 seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies. DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Global Silence
desc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

name: Precision Aura
desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

name: Frozen Sigil
desc: Tusk summons a Frozen Sigil by calling upon the deepest cold of winter. The Sigil creates a snowstorm which slows all enemy units within 600 range.

name: Berserker's Call
desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

name: Counter Helix
desc: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Firefly
desc: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.
